snippet: A groin injury will prevent Red Wings goalie Jimmy Howard from playing in the N.H.L. All-Star Game in two weeks, Detroit Coach Mike Babcock said.
lead_paragraph: A groin injury will prevent Red Wings goalie Jimmy Howard from playing in the N.H.L. All-Star Game in two weeks, Detroit Coach Mike Babcock said.

headline.main: Detroit Goalie Out of All-Star Game
headline.print_headline: Detroit Goalie Out of All-Star Game
